title: FireDAOJackie_Z
author: FireDAOJackie_Z
content: According to CZ, https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1650843368010792961, Binance has integrated ChatGPT into its Web3 academy, which is another milestone in the history of Binance's ecosystem development. The purpose is to educate people about crypto and Web3 more efficiently through the assistance of the new AI chatbot "Binance Sensei". Will this technological advancement boost Binance's overall development and bring a price increase ? Please let me know your thoughts. By the way, I am with FireDAO team and please feel free to contact me if you are interested in our project.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Don't know if the word "efficient" means that binance is actually reducing the staff budget on this sub-service (education), but to see a company as big as binance choosing chatgpt as its educational reference is a bad thing because after all the legitimacy of the AI-generated content is unreliable. Let's see how they apply these "advanced" machines to teach humans.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on April 27, 2023, 03:26:06 AMAccording to CZ, https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1650843368010792961, Binance has integrated ChatGPT into its Web3 academy, which is another milestone in the history of Binance's ecosystem development. The purpose is to educate people about crypto and Web3 more efficiently through the assistance of the new AI chatbot "Binance Sensei". Will this technological advancement boost Binance's overall development and bring a price increase ? Please let me know your thoughts. By the way, I am with FireDAO team and please feel free to contact me if you are interested in our project. As a member of Firedao, have you created an announcement thread for the project in this forum? Does the thread include all the necessary links for users/trader/investors to interact with?Regarding your second question, is Binance creating awareness for ChatGPT or their own AI tool, Binance Sensei, with your opening message? Additionally, does Binance Sensei have a free version available for exploration, similar to ChatGPT?

comments.author: FireDAOJackie_Z
comments.body: Quote from: royalfestus on April 27, 2023, 09:18:25 PMQuote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on April 27, 2023, 03:26:06 AMAccording to CZ, https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1650843368010792961, Binance has integrated ChatGPT into its Web3 academy, which is another milestone in the history of Binance's ecosystem development. The purpose is to educate people about crypto and Web3 more efficiently through the assistance of the new AI chatbot "Binance Sensei". By the way, I am with FireDAO team and please feel free to contact me if you are interested in our project. Additionally, does Binance Sensei have a free version available for exploration, similar to ChatGPT?Please refer to this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441307.msg61854152#msg61854152 to find more details about our project. comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: I don't think this integration will have any direct impact on bnb price, it will rather boost the binance academy learning process to degree. Users of the academy will most likely find it more easier to get things done with the help of the AI than it would naturally be. Â The one thing I like about cz and binance is how they quickly react to change and always ready to incorporate new features into the business.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Price increase of what?If it's just all about a chatbot where it will answer questions related to crypto then it's efficiency is all about being answered quickly with a good accuracy.I don't see anything related to it that can increase the price of specific token that will benefit from it. If it's an API that's being integrated to Binance academy then it will make things easier as it automates the questioning and answering.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: It's a sure thing that Binance finally found a way to efficiently reduced the number of the employs who would other wise do that educating thing for the exchange. I guess that's why they're saying that now their platform can educate the users efficiently because they added an AI bot that will do the job itself.I don't think that addition of that AI will ever increase the development of the platform, and there is no chance that such bots can ever be proven to increase the price of BNB. It will just help those users who lack knowledge about Crypto and Web3 in general. That bot can definitely help those users who have very limited knowledge in those area other than that I don't find any good use case of the bot on their platform.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Any business that failed to incorporate AI into their business will struggle and be late to the game, for now, people are still not certain about the role AI will play in the future, so many assumptions that won't come true but this is certain it has a big role to play. It is a wise decision on the part of Binnace to start incorporating AI into their core business value at this early stage because it is going to help them to master AI and plan along with it, I won't be surprised to see them buy a solid AI company in future
